name: Easyreco
short_description:
Easy Reco is a reconciliation program tool designed under Excel-Visual basic combination. This program is useful for anyone who needs to reconcile their company details with their supplier details. With EasyReco you can do any type of comparison with two sets of data. The output of this program gives you a detailed reconciled report

Just Input two sets of data, one is your company data and another one is your supplier data, program matches the data based on rules that you define.  Matched records are tagged with an 'audit trail number 1', so you can easily research and report.
 Unmatched records are segregated into two sets, one is data not found in your company and tagged with an 'audit trail number 2' another one is data not found in supplier details and tagged with an 'audit trail number 3'

Simple and easy to use
Installation of software is not required
Program is integrated with Excel file
Thousands of items comparison can be made out in a minute
Flexible for any reco
